1.name: Entrance Hall
1.description: A grand stone chamber with towering pillars and ancient murals depicting forgotten legends. Torches flicker in iron sconces, casting dancing shadows.

2.name: Hall of Echoes
2.description: A long corridor where every sound reverberates endlessly. The walls are lined with mysterious symbols that seem to shift in the torchlight.

3.name: Crystal Sanctum
3.description: A breathtaking chamber filled with massive crystals that pulse with inner light. The air shimmers with magical energy.

4.name: Guardian's Chamber
4.description: A circular room with weapon racks along the walls and a raised platform in the center. Ancient armor stands sentinel in the corners.

5.name: Whispering Gallery
5.description: A curved chamber where voices from the past seem to whisper secrets. Strange acoustic properties make every sound carry in unexpected ways.

6.name: Prism Chamber
6.description: Light refracts through countless crystal prisms, creating a dazzling display of colors. The patterns seem to hold hidden meanings.

7.name: Trial of Strength
7.description: A training ground with obstacles and challenges designed to test physical prowess. Ancient training equipment lines the walls.

8.name: Meditation Chamber
8.description: A serene room with smooth stone floors and walls carved with peaceful imagery. The atmosphere promotes deep contemplation.

9.name: Maze of Mirrors
9.description: A confusing chamber filled with mirrors that reflect not just images, but possibilities. Reality becomes uncertain here.

10.name: Arena of Champions
10.description: A grand arena with tiered seating carved into the stone walls. The floor bears the marks of countless battles.

11.name: Library of Secrets
11.description: Ancient tomes and scrolls line the walls of this scholarly chamber. The knowledge of ages waits to be discovered.

12.name: Chamber of Trials
12.description: A testing ground where multiple challenges await. The room adapts to test the skills of those who enter.

13.name: Throne of Victory
13.description: The final chamber containing an ancient throne. Those who reach here have proven themselves worthy of the labyrinth's secrets.
